pullRequest.title: Issue #4505 Ensure get/setInitParam with null arg throws NPE
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implement throw of NPE if key arg to get/setInitParam is null, as per servlet spec.
Closes #4505

commit.message:
Issue #4505 Ensure get/setInitParam with null arg throws NPE

Signed-off-by: Jan Bartel <janb@webtide.com>

nodes.bodyText: Can you please use Objects.requireNonNull() here?
Can these Executable be converted to lambdas?
